education.institution: U.V.Patel college of engineering, Ganpat University

responsibilities: **Leadership & Mentorship:** Led the development team, overseeing task assignment, monitoring progress, and ensuring seamless collaboration across project phases.
**DevOps Integration:** Integrated **Docker, Jenkins, Apache Solr, and Snyk** to establish robust CI/CD and security scanning, significantly boosting deployment efficiency and code quality.
**Modernization:** Successfully drove the migration of core projects to updated **Java and Spring Boot** versions, resulting in performance gains and reduced technical debt.
**Client & Production Support:** Served as a primary contact for production issues, collaborating directly with clients to provide prompt resolutions and maintain system uptime.
**Quality Assurance:** Developed and maintained comprehensive end-to-end UI automation test suite using **Selenium**, reducing manual testing effort by an estimated 40%.

sections.heading: AI Agent Development
details: Engineered autonomous agents with advanced reasoning and planning capabilities.
Integrated LangChain and LangGraph for complex agentic workflows.
Developed and deployed Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for enhanced knowledge retrieval.
Designed and implemented multi-agent collaborative systems for intricate problem-solving.

sections.heading: LLM-Powered Applications
details: Seamlessly integrated OpenAI APIs and other LLMs into various applications.
Expert in prompt engineering crafting effective prompts for optimal LLM performance.
Utilized vector databases (Pinecone Chroma FAISS) for efficient semantic search and context management.
Gained experience in model fine-tuning and optimization for specific domain tasks.

projects.title: Enterprise eProcurement System
projects.period: Aug 2023 - Present | Role: Full-Stack Developer & Team Lead
highlights: **Leadership & Collaboration:** Led the development team, assigning tasks, monitoring progress, and ensuring seamless collaboration across project phases. Worked directly with clients for production issue resolution.
**Full-Stack Development:** Built complex business logic with **Java/Spring Boot** backend and reactive UIs with **Angular 11**, using **IntelliJ IDEA** as primary development environment.
**DevOps Integration:** Expanded technical expertise by integrating **Docker, Jenkins, Apache Solr, and Snyk** to boost project efficiency, security scanning, and deployment automation.
**Quality Assurance:** Developed end-to-end UI automation test cases using **Selenium**, strengthening testing capabilities and reducing manual testing effort.

**Migration & Modernization:** Successfully contributed to migrating the project to updated **Java and Spring Boot** versions, performing debugging and efficiently resolving development and testing phase issues.
**Data Management:** Managed persistence layer with **Hibernate/JPA** and **MySQL**, implementing **Apache Solr** for high-performance search with sub-second query times.

projects.title: IAS OMID Multi-Platform Test Harness
highlights: **Multi-Platform Development:** Developed applications for **Roku TV, Amazon Fire TV, Apple TV, Android mobile, and iPhone** devices using platform-specific technologies and tools.
**Technology Stack:** Used **Java/Kotlin** for Android & Fire TV, **Swift** for Apple TV & iOS, **Bright Script** for Roku TV, and **HTML/CSS/JavaScript** for Samsung TV (Tixen Studio).
**Ad Tech Compliance:** Implemented the industry-mandated **OMID Library** for event tracking, log generation, and performance measurement across all platforms.
**Advanced Features:** Implemented **XML parsing, network calls, multiple ad types** and scenarios, integrated **Charles** for debugging and network analysis.
**Development Tools:** Utilized **Android Studio, Xcode, Tixen Studio, Visual Studio Code** and **Charles** for comprehensive cross-platform development and debugging.
